Others: The Boston Celtics began 2025 with an elite performance against Anthony Edwards and the Minnesota Timberwolves on Thursday night.
Boston entered another shorthanded situation with starters Jaylen Brown (right shoulder strain) and Kristaps Porzingis (left ankle sprain) both ruled out.
The Celtics held Anthony Edwards to six shots in the second half and 15 points total in their tough 118-115 road win at the Timberwolves.
